mapper.insert: insert into eventDB (EventName, Participant2String, PayerName, EventDate, Price, TravelName, DividePrice, GetPrice) values (#{EventName}, #{Participant2String}, #{PayerName}, #{EventDate}, #{Price}, #{TravelName}, #{DividePrice}, #{GetPrice})
mapper.select: select EventDate from eventDB where TravelName = #{TravelName} order by EventDate ASC limit 1
select EventDate from eventDB where TravelName = #{TravelName} order by EventDate DESC limit 1
select count(*) from eventDB where TravelName = #{TravelName}
select * from eventDB where Participant2String LIKE concat('%', #{PersonName}, '%')
